nguy_co_nga: Stick fall-risk sticker on patient's shirt
doi_tuong_co_nguy_co_nga_cao: Does patient have high risk of falling
screening_2: Does patient need help standing or walking
intervention_1: Stick fall risk sticker on patient's shirt
intervention_3: Limit unnecessary ambulation. Request patient to ask for support when he/she needs to walk
intervention_4: Instruct patient on how to use the emergengy call bell in toilet
intervention_6: Provide ambulatory aids: stretcher, crutches, wheelchair
intervention_7: Environment: dried floor, adequate lighting, remove unnecessary items, call bell and personal belongs within reach
intervention_9: Raise bed's rails, lower bed or lock bed brakes
intervention_10: Under 3-year-old children: Not leaving them unattended
